com.selesse.jxlint.model.rules

Class LintRulesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.selesse.jxlint.model.rules.LintRulesImpl

  • public class LintRulesImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton for the LintRules implementation. Also contains information about whether or not the program is in test mode.

      • willExitAfterReporting

        public static boolean willExitAfterReporting()
        Returns whether or not the program will exit after reporting. Specifically, if it will call System.exit(int).

      • setExitAfterReporting

        public static void setExitAfterReporting(boolean exitAfterReporting)
        Set whether or not the program will exit after reporting. Specifically, it will call System.exit(int) if exitAfterReporting is true.
